sentences.en: A youth was killed and another critically injured.
sentences.cn: 一名青年被杀，另一名受重伤。

sentences.en: Bass examined the quality of the furniture critically.
sentences.cn: 巴斯以挑剔的目光检查家具的质量.

sentences.en: Critically examine your work as if you were looking at someone else's efforts.
sentences.cn: 要像评价别人的工作一样,一丝不苟地检查你自己的工作.

sentences.en: He has spoken critically of the government’s refusal to support the industry.
sentences.cn: 他谈到政府拒绝支持这个行业时颇有微词。

sentences.en: He was aware of Vernon Demerest looking at him critically.
sentences.cn: 他知道弗农?德默雷斯特在盯着他找岔.

sentences.en: It was a critically important moment in his career.
sentences.cn: 那是他事业中至关重要的一刻。

sentences.en: Microbial degradation critically affects the fate and behavior of pesticides in soil.
sentences.cn: 生物降解主要影响土壤中农药的行为和命运.

sentences.en: She kept vigil at the bedside of her critically ill son.
sentences.cn: 她整夜都守在病重的儿子床边。

sentences.en: She looked at it critically for a moment.
sentences.cn: 她很认真地看了一会儿.

sentences.en: She looked at it critically for a moment. " It's all right,'she said, " but isn't it upside - down? " I looked at it again. She was right.
sentences.cn: 她审视了一会. “ 这画不错, ” 她说道: “ 不过,这不是挂颠倒了 吗 ? ” 我又看了一下, 她说得对.
她说起拉腊来颇有微词。

sentences.en: The plane was critically disabled when one of the engines caught fire.
sentences.cn: 有一台引擎起火,使飞机严重受损.

sentences.en: This has given him a disposition to consider our traditions critically.
sentences.cn: 这使他倾向以批判眼光看待我们的传统。

sentences.en: We should critically assimilate whatever is beneficial in literature and arts from other countries.
sentences.cn: 我们应当批判地吸收别国文学艺术中一切有益的东西.
